message.content: {"given_definition_quality":90,"better_definition":"abroad","sentence":"他在国外。","image_prompt":"A young man stands in front of famous world landmarks like the Eiffel Tower and the Statue of Liberty, with an airplane flying overhead. The style is soft apocalypse animation: muted pastel colors, gentle lighting, slight surreal atmosphere with faded cityscapes and distant ruins blending into the background. The image should capture a sense of quiet travel and being far from home.","sentence_translation":"He is abroad."}
